CustomField.description: Checked if any Final Fit offers are checked
CustomField.formula: OR ( Appliances__c = TRUE, Fly_screens_barrier_doors__c = TRUE, Garage_doors__c = TRUE, Hot_water_service__c = TRUE, Decorative_external_lighting__c = TRUE, Smart_home__c = TRUE, Shower_screens_mirrors__c = TRUE, Tapware__c = TRUE, Air_conditioners__c = TRUE )
CustomField.label: Final Fit
